Rooms at the Bambi Boutique are spacious. They are decorated in a regional style with light wood decorations. They all have a private bathroom.
Each room at Residence Bambi has an electric kettle and a radio. Most of them also have a balcony with a picturesque view of the Tatra Mountains.
